desc: We Are Hiring: Early Childhood EducatorWe are a modern and dynamic team of like-minded individuals, fostering an environment of mutual support, sincerity, respect, and a truly comfortable atmosphere.We always strive for the best! If our values resonate with you, we would love to have you on our team!Job Responsibilities: Work schedule: 2 days a week (have oportunity to choose) 9:00 AM ‚Äî 4:00 PM (including a lunch break). Conducting educational activities in a play-based learning format. Ensuring children‚Äôs safety and hygiene. Participating in lesson planning and preparation. Communicating with parents. Collaborating effectively within the team. Requirements: Passion for working with children. Understanding of child psychology. Ability to engage children through play-based learning. Excellent communication skills, friendliness, and a positive attitude Responsibility and creativity. Commitment to continuous professional development. Ability to inspire curiosity and a love for learning in every child. What We Offer: Stable salary. Comfortable working conditions. Friendly and supportive team. Modern facilities and equipment. Opportunities for professional growth, training, and workshops. If you are passionate about early childhood education and want to be part of a warm and professional team, we would love to hear from you!
